text: Dai nyasha dzaAllah netsitsi dzavo dzisina kuva pauri (Muhammad (SAW)), zvirokwazvo chikamu pakati pavo dai vakaronga kuti vave vanokurasisa, asi havave vanokurasisa kunze kwekuti pachezvavo, uye hapana chakaipa chavanokwanisa kuita kwauri nyangwe chidiki. Uye Allah vakave vanokutumira Gwaro (Qurâ€™aan), nehungwaru (mitemo yeIslaam), uye vakave vanokudzidzisa izvo zvaukange usingazivi. Uye nyasha dzaAllah kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)) dzakakura
